metadata.title: CVE-2021-40566 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A Segmentation fault casued by heap use after free vulnerability exists inGpac through 1.0.1 via the mpgviddmx_process function in reframe_mpgvid.cwhen using mp4box, which causes a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
